title.rendered: Big Data in healthcare: where does the value come from?

<title>Big Data in Healthcare: Examples, Problems, and Benefits — ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="Big data in healthcare has the potential to transform the industry. Big data analytics applications range from treating cancer to managing mental conditions and improving population health. Learn about the challenges on your way to benefiting from medical big data, and how to set yourself up for success." />
